 = XML Node Type Summary = 

The complete XML Schema can be found here: [http://jseance.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/jseance/src/main/resources/JSeance1.0.xsd JSeance1.0.xsd].

http://JSeance.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/node-types.png

 = XML Node Details =

 == Template ==

*Description:* Root element for a JSeance  XML Template.

*Child Elements:* Model, Text, !FileOutput, Conditional, Switch, Definition, Include, !OutputIterator & !JavaScript.

 == Model ==

*Description:* Loads an XML model into the parent context. Models can be referenced in !JavaScript as Models`['name'`] or Models`['default'`] for unnamed models.

|| *Attribute Name* || *Description* || *Required* ||
|| fileName || The filename of the model relative to the Models runtime directory || Yes ||
|| _name_|| Name of the model if specific model references are needed, the last declared model becomes the current model in the context, make sure to define a model names if you are using multiple input models || No ||
|| _e4XPath_ || The E4X Path of the currentNode, otherwise rootNode becomes the currentNode || No ||
|| _validate_ || Indicates if the parser should validate the XML file against an XSD schema, either included in the XML file or specified in the xsdFileName parameter || No ||
|| _xsdFileName_ || Indicates the name of the XSD file to use if validate is true, relative to the Models runtime directory || No ||

 == Text ==

*Description:* Simple text output to the default text sink.

|| *Attribute Name* || *Description* || *Required* ||
|| escaping || Allows text to be escaped, valid options are: xml-attribute, xml-value, html, java, javascript and sql || No ||

 == !FileOutput ==

*Description:* Specifies a file to use as output. All text outputs within children will be written  to the specified file.

*Child Elements:* Model, Text, !FileOutput, Conditional, Switch, Definition, Include, !OutputIterator & !JavaScript.

|| *Attribute Name* || *Description* || *Required* ||
|| fileName || The filename to open, relative to the Target runtime directory || Yes ||
|| encoding || File eoncoding to use, valid options are: ISO-8859-1, ISO-8859-2, ISO-8859-3, ISO-8859-4, ISO-8859-5, ISO-8859-6, ISO-8859-7, ISO-8859-8, ISO-8859-9, ISO-8859-13, ISO-8859-15, UTF-8, UTF-16, ISO-2022-JP, Shift_JIS, EUC-JP, US-ASCII, GBK, Big5, ISO-2022-CN, ISO-2022-KR, ISO-8859-15, ISO-8859-15 || No ||
|| writeXMLHeader || Specifies if an XML header needs to be created for the file || No ||

 == Conditional ==

*Description:* Parent node for if--elseif-else functionality.

*Child Elements:* If, !ElseIf, Else.

 === If ===

*Description:* Fist child element of the Conditional node, represents the first comparison statement.

*Child Elements:* Model, Text, !FileOutput, Conditional, Switch, Definition, Include, !OutputIterator & !JavaScript.

|| *Attribute Name* || *Description* || *Required* ||
|| jsExpression || The !JavaScript expression to evaluate || Yes ||

 === !ElseIf ===

*Description:* Second or greater child element of the Conditional node, represents an else-if expression.

*Child Elements:* Model, Text, !FileOutput, Conditional, Switch, Definition, Include, !OutputIterator & !JavaScript.

|| *Attribute Name* || *Description* || *Required* ||
|| jsExpression || The !JavaScript expression to evaluate || Yes ||


 === Else ===

*Description:* Parent node for  switch-case functionality.

*Child Elements:* Model, Text, !FileOutput, Conditional, Switch, Definition, Include, !OutputIterator & !JavaScript.

 == Switch ==

*Description:* Parent node for  switch-case functionality.

*Child Elements:* Case, Default.

|| *Attribute Name* || *Description* || *Required* ||
|| jsExpression || The !JavaScript expression to evaluate || Yes ||

 === Case ===

*Description:* Evaluation option for a Switch parent node.

*Child Elements:* Model, Text, !FileOutput, Conditional, Switch, Definition, Include, !OutputIterator & !JavaScript.

|| *Attribute Name* || *Description* || *Required* ||
|| value || The value to compare the parent node jsExpression result || Yes ||

 === Default ===

*Description:* The default expression to evaluate if no match is found.

*Child Elements:* Model, Text, !FileOutput, Conditional, Switch, Definition, Include, !OutputIterator & !JavaScript.

 == Definition ==

*Description:* Named variable used to send parameters to included templates of for oten-used values. Can be referenced from !JavaScript by Definitions`['name'`].

*Child Elements:* Model, Text, !FileOutput, Conditional, Switch, Definition, Include & !JavaScript.

|| *Attribute Name* || *Description* || *Required* ||
|| name || Name of the Definition || Yes ||

 == Include ==

*Description:* Includes another template file in the current template.

|| *Attribute Name* || *Description* || *Required* ||
|| fileName|| File name relative to the Includes runtime directory || Yes ||

 == !OutputIterator ==

*Description:* An XML node iterator relative to the current model node, it text production while iterating over an XML node list.

*Child Elements:* Model, Text, !FileOutput, Conditional, Switch, Definition, Include, !OutputIterator & !JavaScript.

|| *Attribute Name* || *Description* || *Required* ||
|| e4XPath || The e4XPath from the current node to select a group of nodes to iterate from, e4XPath expression is expected to return a nodegroup || Yes ||
|| _modelName_ || The name of the model to use || No ||
|| _separator_ || A separator to use when concatenating data, useful for building text structures such as comma-separated lists || No ||

 == !JavaScript ==

*Description:* Allows custom !JavaScript declarations to be embedded into the template.
